summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for the Flax implementation of the Whisper speech‑to‑text model, checking configuration integrity, encoder positional embeddings, forward‑pass signature, JIT compilation behavior, and the ability to serialize and deserialize models across Flax and PyTorch formats, including BF16 precision handling.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, performance, and cross‑framework compatibility of the Flax Whisper model before deployment, reducing regression risk and ensuring reliable model persistence and execution.
